Mass. reports 438 new confirmed coronavirus cases, 9 new deathsThe uptick in COVID-19 cases in Massachusetts continued its march forward, as the state reported a 438 rise in confirmed cases on Tuesday — the first time daily reported cases rose above 400 since early June — bringing the total to 111,033. The death toll from confirmed cases of the coronavirus in the state rose by nine to 8,436.
